General.sectionAddedBelow: Your section has been added below
General.title: Title
General.searchMinInstructions: Enter a minimum of three characters to search
General.requiredFieldWarning: Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are mandatory
General.emailSuccessfullyChangedDescription: To continue working please go to the dashboard.
General.pageNotFoundDescription: The page you are looking for cannot be found
General.cancelDescription: If you leave this page, all your data <important>will be lost</important>.
General.itemsSelectedMessage: {count, plural, =0 {no followers yet} =1 {# item selected} other {# items selected}}.
General.assignedBarnahusInfoText: The Barnahus will be assigned to this Master-Admin.
General.addBarnahusOnboardingDescription: Adding a Barnahus will allow you to assign a Master Admin, who can invite additional Barnahus staff.
General.addMasterAdminOnboardingDescription: The Master Admin is the first person to be invited to the dashboard and their role is to invite other contributors to the dashboard (Admins and Practitioners) and manage the content for the app.
General.onboardingLastStepDescriptionPartOne: If you want more information or in-depth guidance on how to use the app and dashboard, please see our additional resources. You can check implementation handbook and in-depth user guide

ValidationMeseges.password: Please make sure your password meets the criteria.
ValidationMeseges.confirmPassword: Please make sure your passwords match.
ValidationMeseges.phone: Invalid phone number. Please try again.

Onboarding.title: Hi, welcome to Journeys
Onboarding.description: To better understand your responsibilities, follow the steps.

Languages.addContentLanguage: Add the languages that you will use to write the content in the app (Content language)
Languages.noListDataDescription: In order to be able to populate the app with content about your Barnahus, you must first add the languages which you would like to use in the app. You can add as many languages as you want. There is also a possibility to enable auto-translation. If auto-translation is enabled for a language, you can quickly auto-translate the content that you have written for the default language. Always double check the auto-translation before publishing the content in the new language.
Languages.statusInfoText: The language will stay inactive until text is added in the language. The status will change to active once the content is published.
Languages.autoTranslateInfoText: Auto-translation is enabled when the content has been published in the default language as the translation process relies on the default language as the source for translation.
Languages.deleteLanguageDescription: Press delete if you want to delete the language. Please note: all content connected to that language <important>will be deleted!</important>

Authorization.passwordInstructions: Min 8 and max 24 characters, 1 number and 1 symbol
Authorization.invalidLogin: Your password and/or email are invalid. Try again.

ForgotPassword.instructions: Enter the account's email address. A link will be sent to reset your password.
ForgotPassword.successInstructions2: Click on the link. It will redirect you to the page where you can reset your password.
ForgotPassword.resendInstructions: If you didn't receive an email, please press the 'resend' button

PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.title: Password successfully changed
PasswordSuccessfullyChanged.instructions: Please login to your account again.

Barnahuses.successfullyCreated: The Barnahus has been added & the Master-Admin has been invited.
Barnahuses.addBarnahusDescription: Please note that the new Barnahus will be the central hub for adding all personnel at that location, including an Admin for content management and practitioners for custom case journeys.
Barnahuses.deleteBarnahusesDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the Barnahus.
Barnahuses.assignedMasterAdminInfoText: Once the Master-Admin is added, their name will appear here.
Barnahuses.noListDataDescription: Add a Barnahus and assign a Master-Admin

Admins.deleteAdminDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the Admin.
Admins.noListDataDescription: You can add multiple Admins. The Admins will be in charge of overseeing content for the Barnahus and adding Practitioners.
Admins.addAdminDescription: Please note that <important>the Admin will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the Journeys dashboard.
Admins.onboardingAddPractitionerDescription: As an Admin, you can add Practitioners and generate journeys for children. Please consult the implementation kit for further information about Admins.

MasterAdmins.addAndAssignBarnahusDescription: Once you've added a Master-Admin, you'll need to add a Barnahus and assign the Master-Admin to that Barnahus.
MasterAdmins.noListDataDescription: A Master-Admin must be added for all Barnahus.
MasterAdmins.addMasterAdminDescription: Please note that the Master-Admin <danger>will not receive an email invitation</danger> until you also add their Barnahus and assign it to this Master-Admin. Only then will they receive the invitation.
MasterAdmins.deleteMasterAdminDescription: Note: If you delete this Master-Admin, they won't be able to access their account.
MasterAdmins.partialDeleteMasterAdminDescription: Note: at least one of the Master-Admins cannot be deleted because they have been assigned to a Barnahus.
MasterAdmins.noDeleteMasterAdminDescription: Note: the Master-Admin cannot be deleted since they have already been assigned to a Barnahus.
MasterAdmins.onboardingAddAdminDescription: If you're the sole captain, you manage all sections alone. Adding an Admin grants them almost identical rights to yours, enabling them to assist with main content setup.
MasterAdmins.onboardingAddPractitionerDescription: Adding a practitioner enables them to create Custom IDs, templates, and Custom Journeys. However, they cannot add any new content, only use the existing content. You can add as many new practitioners as you like. Please consult the implementation kit if anything is unclear.
MasterAdmins.onboardingSetupAppContentDescription: One of your main responsibilities is to populate the app with content about your Barnahus.
MasterAdmins.onboardingCreateCustomiedIDDescription: Creating a Custom ID is part of creating and tailoring a Custom Journey for a child.
MasterAdmins.onboardingCreateTemplateDescription: Creating a template simplifies the process of building a Custom Journey by providing a predefined template. This template can be used as-is or further customized.
MasterAdmins.onboardingCreateCaseJourneyDescription: Creating a Custom Journey provides a final, presentational dashboard. This can be built from a template, which can be used as-is, further customized, or created entirely from scratch.

Practitioners.deletePractitionerDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the practitioner.
Practitioners.noListDataDescription: Here you will see a list of all the practitioners at your Barnahus. Practitioners have the mandate to create Custom IDs, templates, and tailor journeys. However, they cannot add any new content, only use the existing content. You can add as many new practitioners as you like.
Practitioners.addPractitionerDescription: Please note that <important>the user will receive an email invitation,</important> which will grant them access to the Journeys dashboard.

ManageContent.selectContentDescription: You can make <guidelines>one content type per language</guidelines>. If you want the same content type in another language, create a new one and choose the language. <guidelines>Our software will translate it automatically,</guidelines> and you can adjust it as needed.
ManageContent.staffDescriptionPlaceholder: Write a short description about the Staff Member...
ManageContent.contentEditedDescription: Content has been successfully edited! If you wish to edit more, please choose a language from the dropdown and click the 'Edit more' button.
ManageContent.aboutBarnahusContentSccessfullyCreated: The 'About Barnahus' content was created successfully.
ManageContent.aboutBarnahusContentSccessfullyUpdated: The 'About Barnahus' content was updated successfully.
ManageContent.previewAndPublishContentDescription: Before publishing the content, please check how the content will look for the user.
ManageContent.contentPublishedDescription: To create content in different languages, start by choosing the language you want to work with.
ManageContent.addAboutInfoText: Add more sections if you would like to tailor the language to different age groups. You can decide later which one you would like to show for the user.
ManageContent.addRoomInfoText: Add more rooms here. You can remove the added sections later.
ManageContent.addStaffInfoText: Add more staff here. You can remove the added sections later.
ManageContent.waitingRoomTitlePlaceholder: Write the name of the room...
ManageContent.waitingRoomDescriptionPlaceholder: Write what the child can expect in the room...
ManageContent.selectLanguageDescription: Choose the language you will use to write the content.
ManageContent.description: Here, you can provide detailed information about your Barnahus
ManageContent.noListDataDescription: In this section, you can add information about your specific Barnahus. There will be an oppurtunity to create multiple sections with similar content. This is to ensure that you can have, for example, three descriptions of your Barnahus, tailored to different age groups. When creating a journey, you decide which content from this section will be shown to the user.
ManageContent.generalIntroductionPlaceholderTitle: Write the title of this section...
ManageContent.deleteContentDescription: Press 'Delete' to remove the content. Please note: Deleting content in one language will delete the content <important> in all languages.</important>
ManageContent.addAndReviewNewContentDescription: Since the language is auto-translated, review the translated content before publishing.
ManageContent.contentNotAddedInDefaultLanguageTitle: Content has not been added in the default language
ManageContent.contentNotAddedInDefaultLanguageDescript: To add content in the default language click on the button below. The content must be added in the default language before it can be auto-translated.
ManageContent.addPhotoInfo: The photos will remain the same and are not tied to a specific language.
ManageContent.publishedDescription: You sucessfully created {section} in all published languages. If you want to create another {section}, click on the button below.
ManageContent.noContentToBePublishedDescription: There is no content to publish.
ManageContent.contentNotAddedDescription: Since this language is not being auto-translated, you need to add the content manually to publish content in this language.
ManageContent.addAboutDescription: Add additional sections with information about your Barnahus.
ManageContent.editAboutDescription: When you edit this section in the default language, it will auto-translate to the other added languages. Review before saving.
ManageContent.addRoomDescription: Add additional sections with information about the rooms in your Barnahus.
ManageContent.addRoomsDescription: Add additional sections with information about the rooms in your Barnahus.
ManageContent.editRoomDescription: When you edit this section in the default language, it will auto-translate to the other added languages. Review before saving.
ManageContent.addStaffDescription: Add additional sections with information about the staff at your Barnahus.
ManageContent.editStaffDescription: When you edit this section in the default language, it will auto-translate to the other added languages. Review before saving.

CaseFiles.customizedIdInfoText: Choose an appropriate Custom ID for the User.
CaseFiles.noListDataDescription: To create a custom journey for a child, you need to create a Custom-ID that you will link the Custom Journey to. This Custom ID will also serve as the code that children use the first time they log in to their journey. There is no limit to the number of Custom IDs you can create.
CaseFiles.barnahusInfoText: Admins can only be added to their Barnahus.
CaseFiles.deleteCaseFileDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the Custom Journey.
CaseFiles.addCaserDescription: When adding a new Custom ID, you can utilize the created Custom ID to design a customized journey specifically tailored to it.
CaseFiles.notesInfoText: Turning on notes allows the child to add comments about their journey.

CaseJourney.selectCustomIdTitle: Enter a Custom ID to start
CaseJourney.selectCustomIdDescription: Please enter a custom ID. This ID will be the code the child uses to log in for the first time.
CaseJourney.noContentDescription: There is no content in this section to pick from
CaseJourney.enableNotesDescription: Turning on notes allows the child to add comments about their journey.. If you want to disable them later, you can do that as well.
CaseJourney.setCasePasswordDescription: A password is set so the journey will be protected and private, ensuring it is maximally personalized for the user.
CaseJourney.selectBarnahusContentDescription: Choose the content you would like to display for the user.
CaseJourney.selectRoomsContentTitle: Select the Rooms you would like to display for the user.
CaseJourney.selectRoomsContentDescription: Choose the content you would like to display for the user.
CaseJourney.selectStaffContentTitle: Select the staff you would like to display for the user.
CaseJourney.selectStaffContentDescription: Choose the content you would like to display for the user.
CaseJourney.dragToRearrangeDescription: Rearrange the rooms. You can delete rooms if you don't want to show them.
CaseJourney.caseJourneySavedDescription: Now that you've created a Custom Journey, you can use it inside mobile app.
CaseJourney.chooseCaseJourneyTypeCreationTitle: Choose your way of creating Custom Journey
CaseJourney.chooseCaseJourneyTypeCreationDescription: You can either create a Custom Journey from a template, which includes pre-selected data from content, or custom Custom Journey from the full content.
CaseJourney.selectTemplateDescription: Please select template so you can create Custom Journey from it. If you choose the general template, the password needed to log in to your journey will be shown.
CaseJourney.chooseCreateFromTemplateTypeTitle: How do you want to use the template?
CaseJourney.chooseCreateFromTemplateTypeDescription: You can edit the template after you've chosen it.
CaseJourney.deleteCaseJourneyDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the Custom Journey.
CaseJourney.noListDataDescription: By creating a Custom Journey, you will produce the final product of the Journeys dashboard, which will be visible in the mobile application to all users with access.

Settings.emailInstructions: You must verify your new email before you can use it to log-in
Settings.emailVerificationDialogDescription: Verify the updated email. After confirming your email, log in to update it in your settings.

Templates.name: Template name
Templates.isGeneralTitle: Will this template be used to create generic journeys?
Templates.nameDescription: Choose a name for the template.
Templates.selectTemplateDescription: To create a Custom Journey from template, choose the template you want to use. You can modify the template after you've chosen it.
Templates.setTemplatePasswordDescription: A password is set so the journey will be protected and private, ensuring it is maximally personalized for the user.
Templates.previewAndSaveContentDescription: Before saving the template, please check how it will look for the user.
Templates.templateSavedDescription: Now that you've created a template, you can use it to create Custom Journeys.
Templates.noContentPublishedDescription: To create templates, you need existing content about your Barnahus. Since there's no content yet, you cannot create a template. Please add some content,  or ask an Admin to add some content, and then return to this tab to create templates.
Templates.noListDataDescription: The templates are journeys that you can use multiple times without choosing the content all over again. Setting up a template is like setting up a Custom Journey, you choose the rooms, staff, and the information you would like to include. When creating a journey for a child, you can choose “Create from template” and this will automatically create the journey for you.
Templates.deleteTemplateDescription: Press 'Delete' if you want to remove the tempate.
Templates.isGeneralDescription: Generic journeys are journeys that can be shared with multiple children at once. All other journeys can only be accessed by the child that the journey has been tailored for
